articles.title: Quantum Computing Breakthrough: Silicon Encoded Spin Qubits Achieve Universality - SciTechDaily
articles.description: HRL Laboratories, LLC, has published the first demonstration of universal control of encoded spin qubits. This newly emerging approach to quantum computation uses a novel silicon-based qubit device architecture, fabricated in HRL’s Malibu cleanroom, to trap s…
articles.content:
Render of a six-dot SLEDGE device in silicon, which implemented universal logic with encoded spin qubits. Credit: HRL Laboratories
